chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: The package was apparently opened and resealed with brown adhesive tape. The seal of the inner, small packaging was damaged. Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Johanna, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find the list of locations here: To prepare your return: 1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item at this link. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective covering or film. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. To package the product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product lying flat inside so it can't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside the box in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and out before you send it. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be shipped! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives with us. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Aysu Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Our repair team is currently processing the phone, we will take note this. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

The customer states that the case from another order was sent together with the phone by mistake. Can you check this and send the cover back to the customer?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we were unable to find a case with the device. Kindly check with the customer if they are sure the case was delivered together with the device.

Regards,
JH
